item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 27 Jul 2021
item.description:
1. pyre-ast: full-fidelity Python parser in OCaml
  2. OCaml+Opam Images for Docker for Windows
  3. Borns a stream talking about OCaml/Reason & ReScript language
  4. An Update on the State of the PPX Ecosystem and ~ppxlib~'s Transition
  5. How to send email from Dream
